trans-unit.source: Provides a synchronization context for the Windows Forms application model.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en synkroniseringskontekst for Windows Forms programmet modellen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> is installed when a control is created.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> installeres når en kontroll er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The AutoInstall property determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> is installed when a control is created, or when a message loop is started.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen automatisk bestemmer om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>installeres når en kontroll er opprettet, eller når en meldingsløkke er startet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> is installed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> er installert, ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer synkroniseringskontekst.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av synkroniseringskontekst.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Opp fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>ble bruker.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: Dispatches an asynchronous message to a synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: Sender meldingen asynkront til et synkroniseringskontekst.

trans-unit.source: The Post method starts an asynchronous request to post a message.
trans-unit.target: Post-metoden starter en asynkron forespørsel om å legge inn en melding.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>representanten å kalle.</xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som er sendt til representanten.

trans-unit.source: Dispatches a synchronous message to a synchronization context
trans-unit.target: Sender en synkron melding til en synkroniseringskontekst

trans-unit.source: If the destination thread no longer exists or the value of its <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the Send method raises an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis målet tråden ikke lenger finnes eller verdien for den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `false`, Send-metoden opphøyer <xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is up to the caller to determine what further action to take.
trans-unit.target: Det er opptil oppkalleren å finne ut hvilken ytterligere handling som skal utføres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>representanten å kalle.</xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som er sendt til representanten.

trans-unit.source: The destination thread no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes ikke lenger måltråden.

trans-unit.source: Uninstalls the currently installed <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> and replaces it with the previously installed context.
trans-unit.target: Avinstallerer den installerte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> og erstatter den med tidligere installerte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: If the previously installed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> is `null`, the current context is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du installerte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>er `null`, gjeldende kontekst er satt til `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: If the currently installed synchronization context is not a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den gjeldende installerte synkroniseringskontekst ikke er en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>, denne metoden støtter ingenting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>
